reviewText: This is a magnificent collection of recent horror films which are at times cheesy and no doubt will be endeared as classic B movies.
Title: Dark Castle Horror Collection

reviewText: Exceptional price for this fairly modern titles. Bought it for a gift but I think I'll order one for myself.
Title: Dark Castle Horror Collection

reviewText: These movies are such guilty pleasures for me... Finding them all in one place just turned out to be so awesome! And at a great price!
Title: Dark Castle Horror Collection

reviewText: These are all excellent movies to watch...  My favorites were, House of Wax, Gothika, and Thirteen Ghosts...nice collection and for a cheap price.
Title: Dark Castle Horror Collection

reviewText: A good set of horror movies; House on Haunted Hill is A remake of the classic with the same name about A group of people gathered together at A mansion that is calmed haunted & they are promised A reward if they can make it through the night but that seems unlikely when people start to die. House of Wax is about young friends & centers on A brother & sister who are twins. They come to what is A ghost town but stumble on another set of killer twin brothers, one of which like making wax figures out of living people. Ghost Ship is about A salvage team recruited to salvage A lost cruise ship that has A lot of ghosts & A story of murder & greed that threatens their lives & souls. Gothika stars Halle Berry as A psychiatrist in A mental hospital but an encounter with A ghost puts her into the same hospital where she tries to find out what is real & what happened to her husband whom they say she killed.
Title: Dark Castle Horror Collection
